title: Crow MC
description: Live with vultures, become a vulture. Live with crows, become a crow.Growing up as the daughter of the Blackhearts MC President and his old lady, Olivia LaVelle has seen it all. Drugs and violence darken her everyday existence. But everything changes when her parents die.After being taken in and rescued from the streets by a cop, Liv rejects her past and decides to join the police force. When she is given an undercover assignment to infiltrate the dangerous Dirty Crow Motorcycle Club, she quickly realizes that dangerous men might just be her one weakness.Will she discover more than she bargained for? Or will her forbidden lust for the president of the MC put her in more danger than she's ever been before?WARNING: Take a ride with the Dirty Crow MC at your own risk! This short story includes deliciously graphic scenes of dangerous sex with the most devastatingly handsome MC President you've ever encountered. Intended for mature audiences, 18 and over.
author: Honey Palomino
